verses.verse: Maschil of Ethan the Ezrahite. I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: With my mouth <S%H6310><s%> will I make known <S%H3045><s%> thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.

For I have said <S%H559><s%>, Mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall be built up <S%H1129><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; Thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> wilt thou establish <S%H3559><s%> in the very heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
I have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with my chosen <S%H972><s%>, I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>:

Thy seed <S%H2233><s%> will I establish <S%H3559><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, And build up <S%H1129><s%> thy throne <S%H3678><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>

And the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> thy wonders <S%H6382><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; Thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> also in the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the holy ones <S%H6918><s%>.

For who in the skies <S%H7834><s%> can be compared <S%H6186><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>? Who among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the mighty <S%H410><s%> is like <S%H1819><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>,

A God <S%H410><s%> very <S%H7227><s%> terrible <S%H6206><s%> in the council <S%H5475><s%> of the holy <S%H6918><s%> ones <S%H3372><s%>, And to be feared above all them that are round about him <S%H5439><s%>?

O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, Who is a mighty <S%H2626><s%> one <S%H3050><s%>, like unto thee, O Jehovah? And thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> is round about thee <S%H5439><s%>.
Thou rulest <S%H4910><s%> the pride <S%H1348><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>: When the waves <S%H1530><s%> thereof arise <S%H7721><s%>, thou stillest them <S%H7623><s%>.

Thou hast broken <S%H1792><s%> Rahab <S%H7294><s%> in pieces <S%H1792><s%>, as one that is slain <S%H2491><s%>; Thou hast scattered <S%H6340><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> with the arm <S%H2220><s%> of thy strength <S%H5797><s%>.
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> are thine <S%H776><s%>, the earth also is thine <S%H8398><s%>: The world and the fulness <S%H4393><s%> thereof <S%H3245><s%>, thou hast founded them.
The north <S%H6828><s%> and the south <S%H3225><s%>, thou hast created <S%H1254><s%> them <S%H8396><s%>: Tabor and Hermon <S%H2768><s%> rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in thy name <S%H8034><s%>.
Thou hast a mighty <S%H1369><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>; Strong <S%H5810><s%> is thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and high <S%H7311><s%> is thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>.

Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and justice <S%H6664><s%> are the foundation <S%H4349><s%> of thy throne <S%H3678><s%>: Lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> go <S%H6923><s%> before thy face <S%H6440><s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the people <S%H5971><s%> that know <S%H3045><s%> the joyful sound <S%H8643><s%>: They walk <S%H1980><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, in the light <S%H216><s%> of thy countenance <S%H6440><s%>.
In thy name <S%H8034><s%> do they rejoice <S%H1523><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>; And in thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> are they exalted <S%H7311><s%>.
For thou art the glory <S%H8597><s%> of their strength <S%H5797><s%>; And in thy favor <S%H7522><s%> our horn <S%H7161><s%> shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%>.
For our shield <S%H4043><s%> belongeth unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And our king <S%H4428><s%> to the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Then thou spakest <S%H1696><s%> in vision <S%H2377><s%> to thy saints <S%H2623><s%>, And saidst <S%H559><s%>, I have laid <S%H7737><s%> help <S%H5828><s%> upon one that is mighty <S%H1368><s%>; I have exalted <S%H7311><s%> one chosen <S%H977><s%> out of the people <S%H5971><s%>.
I have found <S%H4672><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>; With my holy <S%H6944><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> have I anointed him <S%H4886><s%>:
With whom my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%>; Mine arm <S%H2220><s%> also shall strengthen him <S%H553><s%>.
The enemy <S%H341><s%> shall not exact <S%H5378><s%> from him <S%H1121><s%>, Nor the son of wickedness <S%H5766><s%> afflict him <S%H6031><s%>.
And I will beat down <S%H3807><s%> his adversaries <S%H6862><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%>, And smite <S%H5062><s%> them that hate him <S%H8130><s%>.
But my faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and my lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> shall be with him <S%H8034><s%>; And in my name shall his horn <S%H7161><s%> be exalted <S%H7311><s%>.
I will set <S%H7760><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> also on the sea <S%H3220><s%>, And his right hand <S%H3225><s%> on the rivers <S%H5104><s%>.
He shall cry <S%H7121><s%> unto me <S%H1><s%>, Thou art my Father, My God <S%H410><s%>, and the rock <S%H6697><s%> of my salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
I also will make <S%H5414><s%> him my first-born <S%H1060><s%>, The highest <S%H5945><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
My lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> will I keep <S%H8104><s%> for him for evermore <S%H5769><s%>; And my covenant <S%H1285><s%> shall stand fast with him <S%H539><s%>.
His seed <S%H2233><s%> also will I make <S%H7760><s%> to endure for ever <S%H5703><s%>, And his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the days <S%H3117><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
If his children <S%H1121><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> my law <S%H8451><s%>, And walk <S%H3212><s%> not in mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>;
If they break <S%H2490><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, And keep <S%H8104><s%> not my commandments <S%H4687><s%>;
Then will I visit <S%H6485><s%> their transgression <S%H6588><s%> with the rod <S%H7626><s%>, And their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> with stripes <S%H5061><s%>.
But my lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> will I not utterly take <S%H6331><s%> from him <S%H530><s%>, Nor suffer my faithfulness to fail <S%H8266><s%>.
My covenant <S%H1285><s%> will I not break <S%H2490><s%>, Nor alter <S%H8138><s%> the thing that is gone out <S%H4161><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%>.
Once <S%H259><s%> have I sworn <S%H7650><s%> by my holiness <S%H6944><s%>: I will not lie <S%H3576><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>:
His seed <S%H2233><s%> shall endure for ever <S%H5769><s%>, And his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the sun before me <S%H8121><s%>.
It shall be established <S%H3559><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> as the moon <S%H3394><s%>, And as the faithful <S%H539><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> in the sky <S%H7834><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
But thou hast cast off <S%H2186><s%> and rejected <S%H3988><s%>, Thou hast been wroth <S%H5674><s%> with thine anointed <S%H4899><s%>.
Thou hast abhorred <S%H5010><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>: Thou hast profaned <S%H2490><s%> his crown <S%H5145><s%> by casting it to the ground <S%H776><s%>.
Thou hast broken down <S%H6555><s%> all his hedges <S%H1448><s%>; Thou hast brought <S%H7760><s%> his strongholds <S%H4013><s%> to ruin <S%H4288><s%>.
All that pass by <S%H5674><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> rob <S%H8155><s%> him <S%H2781><s%>: He is become a reproach to his neighbors <S%H7934><s%>.
Thou hast exalted <S%H7311><s%> the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of his adversaries <S%H6862><s%>; Thou hast made all his enemies <S%H341><s%> to rejoice <S%H8055><s%>.
Yea <S%H7725><s%>, thou turnest back the edge <S%H6697><s%> of his sword <S%H2719><s%>, And hast not made him to stand <S%H6965><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>.
Thou hast made his brightness <S%H2892><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>, And cast <S%H4048><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> down <S%H4048><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.
The days <S%H3117><s%> of his youth <S%H5934><s%> hast thou shortened <S%H7114><s%>: Thou hast covered <S%H5844><s%> him with shame <S%H955><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
How long <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah? wilt thou hide <S%H5641><s%> thyself for ever <S%H5331><s%>? How long shall thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> burn <S%H1197><s%> like fire <S%H784><s%>?
Oh remember <S%H2142><s%> how short <S%H2465><s%> my time is <S%H7723><s%>: For what vanity hast thou created all the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H1121><s%>!

What man <S%H1397><s%> is he that shall live <S%H2421><s%> and not see <S%H7200><s%> death <S%H4194><s%>, That shall deliver <S%H4422><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of Sheol <S%H7585><s%>? <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Lord <S%H136><s%>, where are thy former <S%H7223><s%> lovingkindnesses <S%H2617><s%>, Which thou swarest <S%H7650><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> in thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%>?

Remember <S%H2142><s%>, Lord <S%H136><s%>, the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%>; How I do bear <S%H5375><s%> in my bosom <S%H2436><s%> the reproach of all the mighty <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%>,
Wherewith thine enemies <S%H341><s%> have reproached <S%H2778><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Wherewith they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> the footsteps <S%H6119><s%> of thine anointed <S%H4899><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for evermore <S%H5769><s%>. Amen <S%H543><s%>, and Amen <S%H543><s%>.
